title: Sunny room with PRIVATE bathroom near NW Ditmars Blvd
posting_body: ['https://youtu.be/3aV0MLi0ALk', 'This is the video tour of the ENTIRE apartment.', 'Please note, apartments tend to look smaller on video than they actually are.', ' The room mentioned in this ad can be seen at 0:14 mark', '*To be clear this is for one of the rooms in the apartment and unfurnished.', ' One year lease minimum.', ' This ad is from a roommate matching service.', '*8 min walk from NW Ditmars Blvd', '*All hardwood floor except for kitchen and bathrooms', '*4 Bedrooms with 2 full bathroom!', " You'd be sharing kitchen and living room with 3 other roommates but", "you'll have your own bathroom!", "*Bedroom can fit California King, however no closet space so you'd need to bring your own dresser", '*On the other hand, this also attached with a smaller room that can be used as a storage or office.*Triple exposure, the only apartment on this 1st floor', '*Dishwasher and microwave in the kitchen', "*Near all of Astoria's hot spots, yet quiet treeelined street", '*Cats ok, no dogs', '*No guarantors - you must have 40X income or above on your own with good credit', "Please email with your name, phone number (required - we won't contact you back without this), tell us a little bit about you and whoever you'll be living with and the best time to view or if you're out of town and cannot be present, request zoom or video tour.", 'BROKER FEE APPLIES!']
